title: Ep32 Gossip at the Corpse Cart
description:
This month's Gossip at the Corpse cart has us foaming at the world's largest mouth over some petty headlines, a Home Depot exorcism, cringe-worthy tales of dating and revenge, miracles of modern science, and a heart warming obit for a woman way too cool to be called Grandma. Tune in for August's episode of GACC!

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
